it.unibz.pomodroid
Class Services

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      it.unibz.pomodroid.SharedActivity
          it.unibz.pomodroid.Services
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Services
extends SharedActivity
implements Runnable

Author:
Daniel Graziotin 4801 , Thomas Schievenin 5701
See Also:
This class is in charge of retrieving tickets from trac and seding events to prom.

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
Overrides:

onClick

public void onClick(View v)

useServices

public void useServices()
Method that starts a thread and shows a nice downloading bar.

run

public void run()
Specified by:
run in interface Runnable
See Also:
As soon as a thread starts, this method is called. If source == PROM, it sends the events to PROM If source == TRAC, it retrieves tickets from TRAC. When the operation is finished,it sends an empty message to the handler in order to inform the system that the operation is finished.

createDialogTrac

private void createDialogTrac()
Method that shows a this.dialog and give the possibility both to retrieve (infinite times) tickets from trac and exit the activity

createDialogProm

private void createDialogProm()
Method that shows a dialog and give the possibility both to retrieve (infinite times) tickets from trac and exit the activity

retrieveTicketsFromTrac

private void retrieveTicketsFromTrac()
                              throws PomodroidException
Throws:
PomodroidException - This method takes all not-closed tikets from track, then inserts them into the local DB.

sendPromEvents

private void sendPromEvents()
                     throws PomodroidException
Throws:
PomodroidException - This method takes all not-closed tickets from trac, then inserts them into the local DB.
